summary:
Health Safety Environment (HSE) Manager large capital projects with over thirty-two years of international experience in the chemical & energy industry. Expertise in HSE Management in process plants, laboratory and office environments during development, construction and operations, incident investigation, emergency response, crisis & business continuity management and change management strategy & integration.

Expertise in HSE Management in process plants, laboratory and office environments during development, construction and operations, incident investigation, emergency response and crisis management, and change management strategy & integration.

Highly skilled in managing the HSSE in global cross-business projects, internal audits, investigations, and assurance reviews, and managing HSE staff.

Serving as an indispensable partner to executive leaders, businesses, project teams and contractors, known for an authentic style with relentless focus on making a difference and pushing the boundaries of improvement and growth and always driven by a passion for building high performing diverse teams.
  
A proactive team player with strong analytical academic mind and large operational experience, known for the courage to intervene and to speak up and able to deliver difficult messages with empathy and intent for learning and improvement. Always focused on adding value to the whole, supporting the “reds” and challenge the “greens”, with a large network.

Excellent in contractor management and team builder with high profile large capital projects, proven ability to manage successful teams and communicate with all levels of stakeholders.

patents.title: Process for the preparation of odor-lean polyether polyols

profile_positions.description: Volunteer project manager for Storks soft and baseball club in the Hague. Project regards installations of new LED sport lighting for three soft and baseball fields, installing PV panels and battery systems to create "Net Zero" sport facility.  Development new sport home, canteen and changing facilities

profile_positions.description: Project consultancy regarding HSSE management, Fire safety, Business Continuity. EmR & Crisis Management
profile_positions.title: Hans de Vos BSc.

profile_positions.description:
Due to extensive background in emergency response and volunteer fire fighter captain, earned the expanded role as Subject Matter Expert (SME) Fire Safety for worldwide Shell real estate portfolio. Responsible for expert advice and guidance to EVP’s, VP’s, Shell businesses,  site managers and project managers regarding fire safety and emergency response.

Resolved Shell Business Assurance Letter (BAL) fire safety issue, for Shell Freeman House (Lagos, Nigeria). This issue was for many years on the BAL. Working in difficult culture environment, to break down the fire safety issue, teach how to manage and give guidance for the local Real Estate Facility Management team to build trust and regain momentum of improvement to resolve the fire safety issue.

Resolved Fire Safety Issue between Shell Argentina and Shell Real Estate, asked by the country chair Argentina to find the solution for Casa Central office, Buenos Aires. In collaboration with the Upstream business Argentina, landlord and Real Estate Facility Management came to practicable solution (ALARP) and investment plan for fire safe office environment.

Resolved issue Shell Al Mirqab Tower office Doha, Qatar with civil defense authority Qatar, worked together with Shell country chair and Shell legal to resolve the issue between Shell and the Qatar civil defense authorities, with the result that the office license to operate is prolonged.

Responsible for safety by design new C23 building, working together with ABT architects, engineers, and other consultancy firms (Visser Smit, Happold, Fugro, IF technologies etc.)
profile_positions.title: Health Safety Security Environment Manager & Senior Subject Matter Expert Fire Life Safety

profile_positions.description:
Health Safety Security Environment Manager Large Capital projects 
Responsible for implementing Shell HSE Project Management Framework, Line Of Defense (LOD) Audits & Assurance, HSSE advisor for the Shell Business Opportunity Manager and Leadership team. 
Responsible for managing a large divers HSE team Shell and contractors; HSE Managers, Supervisors and Permit to Work Issuers .

Responsible for front end loading safety by design, engineering and construction new Shell Head Quarters Campus in The Hague.

Responsible for new C30 office safety by design, project execution and use/ maintainability by working closely with the architect of record (Jacobs & ABT), engineering departments, consultants, and contractors how to achieve safe building design by front end loading HSSE in project, execution, run & maintain and end of life. 

Responsible for HSSE contract management, onboarding 4 main contractors and 52 subcontractor companies to guide them on Shell’s safety culture journey.

Developed Health Safety Security Environment Management System (HSSE MS) for HQP project. Developed and introduced fit for purpose Management System for the HQP project team and contractor companies, multiple procedures to manage the day-to-day project risks via Permit to Work.
profile_positions.title: HSSE Manager Large Capital Projects, Shell International B.V.

profile_positions.description:
The project target is to build world class Offices for Rijswijk (SPTR) & Amsterdam (STCA) and new R&D lab for Rock & Fluid science in Amsterdam (STCA) for Shell Project & Technology.

Responsible for managing the Health and Safety for the asbestos remediation project EPiCentre Rijswijk, and new build laboratory wing project and move Rock and Fluids towards R&D Shell Laboratory Amsterdam.
Managing the HSSE in brown-field petrochemical site in contract MODE 2 environment.
Responsible for safety by design, HSE contractor management, Audit & Assurance. 

Asbestos removal project Zagros (Rijswijk) within budget and project schedule, the project was one of the first large asbestos removal projects in The Netherlands, without asbestos incidents and on time delivery due to front end loading of HSE and making the journey together with the main contractor.

Design and build the L-east laboratory wing Shell Technology Centre Amsterdam (STCA), responsible for safety by design and safe project execution in brown field (working) petrochemical plant environment with zero incidents.

Delivered safe L-east laboratory wing Shell Technology Centre Amsterdam (STCA)commissioning and site tie-ins without incidents, due to good project preparation made successful hot tap tie-ins in the existing laboratory utilities (Incinerator, H2S, H2 etc.).
profile_positions.title: Technical HSSE Manager, Project & Technology NL, Offices & Laboratories project Amsterdam

profile_positions.description:
Production Chemist Drilling fluids and Well Stimulation R&D to enhance oil and gas production

Member of the IMPACT R&D team, to prevent well impairment and negative skin of the reservoir/ well bore.
Developed Magnetic rheological fluids to close/ seal wells with magnetic fields
Developed water based muds with optimal well bore filter cake properties (optimal particle size distribution)
Developed low friction water based mud systems to prevent drill pipe abrasion together with DSM company
profile_positions.title: Production Chemist R&D, Shell Exploration & Production
